headline: Quest Diagnostics Names Benjamin Beauvalot Senior Vice President, Chief Strategy and M&A Officer
summary: Quest Diagnostics (NYSE: DGX), a leading provider of diagnostic information services, today announced that Benjamin Beauvalot, a highly accomplished leader with more than two decades of experience in business strategy and transformation, including mergers and acquisitions (M&A), has joined the company as senior vice president, chief strategy and M&A officer.

content.title: Quest Diagnostics Names Benjamin Beauvalot Senior Vice President, Chief Strategy and M&A Officer
content.summary: Quest Diagnostics (NYSE: DGX), a leading provider of diagnostic information services, today announced that Benjamin Beauvalot, a highly accomplished leader with more than two decades of experience in business strategy and transformation, including mergers and acquisitions (M&A), has joined the company as senior vice president, chief strategy and M&A officer.

thumbnail.caption: Benjamin Beauvalot has joined Quest Diagnostics as Senior Vice President, Chief Strategy and M&A Officer.
